platformer.ExtendedShapes

Class QMControls

  • java.lang.Object
    • BasicShapes.Box
      • platformer.MovingShapes.MBox
        • platformer.ExtendedShapes.MControls
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QMCharacter

    public class QMControls
extends QMBox
    Controls for the box with vector qualities.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QMControls

        public QMControls()
        Creates the QMControls. By default left, right and standing are false. And arrow keys are set to defaults stated in QConstants.
